General.Name: Unicasa Indústria de Móveis S.A
General.Description: Unicasa Indústria de Móveis S.A. manufacture, sell, import, and export furniture in Brazil. It offers furniture made from wood, iron, and aluminum, as well as other products related to household and commercial furniture. The company sells its products under the Dell Anno, New, Casa Brasileira, and Unicasa Corporate brands through dealers and multi-brand stores. Unicasa Indústria de Móveis S.A. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bento Gonçalves, Brazil.
General.Address: Rodovia BR 470, KM 212,930, Bento Gonçalves, RS, Brazil, 95707-540
